fields.name: Ocean
fields.effect: Non-water monsters destroyed at end of turn.

fields.name: Cloning Factory
fields.effect: Add a copy of cards played to your hand.

fields.name: Darkness
fields.effect: Dark monsters played here are hidden until attacked.

fields.name: Mana Spring
fields.effect: Gain 1 mana per turn if field is empty.

monsters.name: Chainsaw Imp
monsters.effect: Gains 200 ATK for each Spirit on your opponent's side of the field. This card can attack all Spirits your opponent controls once each.

monsters.name: Deep Sea Kraken
monsters.effect: Immune to enemy spells while in Ocean field.

monsters.name: Atlantean Warrior
monsters.effect: Unaffected by opponent's spells while in Ocean field

spells.name: Element Blade
spells.description: Change the equipped monster's attribute to one of your choice.
